auth.name: Name
auth.login_subtitle: Enter your email below to login to your account
auth.confirm_password.subtitle: For your security, please confirm your password to continue.
auth.forgot_password_subtitle: Forgot your password? No problem. Just let us know your email address and we will email you a password reset link that will allow you to choose a new one.
auth.email.resend_verification: Click here to re-send the verification email.
auth.email.verification_was_sent: A new verification link has been sent to your email address.
auth.2fa.enter_code: Please confirm access to your account by entering the authentication code provided by your authenticator application.
auth.2fa.enter_recovery_code: Please confirm access to your account by entering one of your emergency recovery codes.
profile.settings.title: Settings
profile.settings.subtitle: Manage your account settings and set e-mail preferences.
profile.information.title: Profile Information
profile.information.description: Update your account's profile information and email address.
profile.password.title: Update Password
profile.password.description: Ensure your account is using a long, random password to stay secure.
profile.delete_account.subtitle: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Before deleting your account, please download any data or information that you wish to retain.
profile.delete_account.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account? Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Please enter your password to confirm you would like to permanently delete your account.
profile.sessions.title: Browser Sessions
profile.sessions.subtitle: If necessary, you may log out of all of your other browser sessions across all of your devices. Some of your recent sessions are listed below; however, this list may not be exhaustive. If you feel your account has been compromised, you should also update your password.
profile.sessions.confirm_password: Please enter your password to confirm you would like to log out of your other browser sessions across all of your devices.
profile.2fa.title: Two Factor Authentication
profile.2fa.subtitle: Two Factor Authentication is an extra layer of security that allows you to confirm your identity when signing in to your account.
profile.2fa.enabled: You have enabled two factor authentication.
profile.2fa.disabled: You have not enabled two factor authentication.
profile.2fa.information: When two factor authentication is enabled, you will be prompted for a secure, random token during authentication. You may retrieve this token from your phone's Google Authenticator application.
profile.2fa.setup: To finish enabling two factor authentication, scan the following QR code using your phone's authenticator application or enter the setup key and provide the generated OTP code.
profile.2fa.finished: Two factor authentication is now enabled. Scan the following QR code using your phone's authenticator application or enter the setup key.
profile.2fa.recovery_codes: Store these recovery codes in a secure password manager. They can be used to recover access to your account if your two factor authentication device is lost.
library.upload.title: Add audiobooks to your library
library.upload.overwrite: Overwrite existing audiobooks in case of duplicates
